[Release Notes]

Metaverse is DJ Orkidea&#039;s second artist album after the critically
acclaimed &#039;Taika&#039; from 2003. The ten track CD features collaborations
with electronic heavyweights Dallas Superstars, Andy Moor, Solarstone,
David West and Lowland. &#039;Metaverse&#039; features big tracks such as
&#039;YearZero&#039;, Orkideas remix of Way Out West&#039;s &#039;Killa&#039; as well as the
breathtaking 12 minute remix journey of &#039;Bye Bye Beautiful&#039; by metal
legends Nightwish. Every CD also contains a unique code for downloading
unique and additional material.

Orkidea has been one of Scandinavia&#039;s leading electronic music artists
for the past 15 years and his long experience within trance genre is
easily heard with influences from old school german trance, BT style
breakbeats, Vangelis and Jarre, classic progressive house sound of
Renaissance and even modern day psy-trance. The album offers a fresh and
unique approach to trance: simultanously retrospective and futuristic,
hypnotic and driving, very melodic yet dancefloor friendly. We are proud
to present you METAVERSE.
